name: High Roller (GMTK 2022)
description:
This is my submission for the GMTK 2022 game jam! The theme this year was "Roll of the Dice"

This is a platformer in which you play as a dice, and the side facing up after a time interval becomes either an upgrade or downgrade to the player. Odds are upgrades, Evens are downgrades! Make sure to move fast though... there's something chasing you

It is very simple but it was very fun to make!

-- HOW TO PLAY --

D to move forward, A to move back, SPACE to jump.
